DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effect of PF-00734200 on HbA1c in type 2 diabetic subjects receiving metformin
DOC.brief_title: Effect of PF-00734200 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Men or women between 1880 years of age with poorly controlled Type 2 diabetes Type 1 or secondary forms of diabetes Currently using insulin
